messages.content: Comfyui Batch Tagger is a custom plugin developed for ComfyUI that allows for tagging multiple images or videos with the same tags at once.
What is the main function of Comfyui Batch Tagger?
The main function of Comfyui Batch Tagger is to apply tags to multiple images or videos quickly and efficiently, saving time otherwise spent tagging each item individually.
How does Comfyui Batch Tagger work?
Comfyui Batch Tagger works by allowing users to select multiple images or videos and then input the desired tags. After submitting, the tags are applied to each selected item.
Can Comfyui Batch Tagger tag videos as well as images?
Yes, Comfyui Batch Tagger can tag not only images but also videos.
What are the benefits of using Comfyui Batch Tagger?

The benefits of using Comfyui Batch Tagger include faster and more efficient tagging of images and videos, simplified tagging workflow, and improved organization and accessibility of media through better tagging.
What is the expected limitation of Comfyui Batch Tagger?

While specific limitations were not mentioned, users should anticipate that it may not be capable of handling very large or extremely complex files, and that any bugs or technical issues should be directed to the plugin's support.
Can Comfyui Batch Tagger be integrated with other tools or software?
The document does not specify, but the built-in nature of the ComfyUI platform should allow for integration with other tools or software to a certain extent.
